HealthcareProviderSpecialty.name: HealthcareProviderSpecialty
HealthcareProviderSpecialty.description: Represents specialties for a practitioner or a service provider organization. A provider can have multiple specialties such as anesthesiology and cardiovascular.

ActiveResearchStudyCount.description: The count of active research studies being performed by the healthcare provider for the specialty. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

CompletedResearchStudyCount.description: The count of research studies completed by the healthcare provider for the specialty. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this provider specialty is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this provider specialty is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

IsPrimarySpecialty.description: Indicates whether the specialty is the provider's primary specialty.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ResearchStudyPhase.description: Specifies the research study phase that the healthcare provider has experience with. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

ResearchStudyType.description: Specifies the research study type that the healthcare provider has experience with. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of an external record on its source system.

SpecialtyId.description: Care specialty record associated with the provider.

SpecialtyRole.description: Role of the specialty for the provider or practitioner.
